mapper.sql: apply_id, sequence, category, apply_unit, sell_subsection, sell_store, is_presale, is_onwall, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_address, buy_date, fault_date, retreat_replacement, rr_mode, fault_code, fault_reason, fault_reason_detail, install_unit, install_date, intaller, delivery_order_num, old_machine_type, old_gome_code, old_brand, old_machine_code, old_inner_code1, old_inner_code2, old_outer_code, machine_type, gome_code, brand, machine_code, inner_code1, inner_code2, outer_code, rr_date, is_ic_back, record_time, status, is_stored, appraiser, check_result, machine_check_fault_reason, center_check_result, center_check_comment, center_check_man, center_check_time, headquarters_check_result, headquarters_check_comment, headquarters_check_man, headquarters_check_time, create_man, create_organization, create_time, alter_man, alter_organization, alter_time, comment, accessory, process_instance_id, applicant, apply_date, service_unit, create_position, is_pass_check
mapper.select:
SELECT apply_id, sequence, category, v6.name apply_unit, org.VTEXT sell_subsection,store.NAME1 sell_store,v1.code_value is_presale,v2.code_value is_onwall, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_address, buy_date, fault_date,v4.code_value retreat_replacement,v3.code_value rr_mode, fault_code, fault_reason, fault_reason_detail, install_unit, install_date, intaller, delivery_order_num, old_machine_type,v5.code_value old_gome_code, old_brand, old_machine_code, old_inner_code1, old_inner_code2, old_outer_code, machine_type,v7.code_value gome_code, brand, machine_code, inner_code1, inner_code2, outer_code, rr_date, is_ic_back, record_time, status, is_stored, appraiser, check_result, machine_check_fault_reason, center_check_result, center_check_comment, center_check_man, center_check_time, headquarters_check_result, headquarters_check_comment, headquarters_check_man, headquarters_check_time, create_man, create_organization, create_time, alter_man, alter_organization, alter_time, comment, accessory,process_instance_id,applicant,apply_date,service_unit,create_position,is_pass_check FROM hx_service_retreat_replacement T LEFT JOIN ecc_sales_org org on org.VKORG=T.sell_subsection LEFT JOIN ecc_store store on store.WERKS=T.sell_store and store.VKORG NOT LIKE 'S%' LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id='sf' AND T.is_presale=v1.code_key LEFT JOIN v_code v2 ON v2.code_id='sf' AND T.is_onwall=v2.code_key LEFT JOIN v_code v3 ON v3.code_id='thms' AND T.rr_mode=v3.code_key LEFT JOIN v_code v4 ON v4.code_id='thj' AND T.retreat_replacement=v4.code_key LEFT JOIN v_code v5 ON v5.code_id='gmdm' AND T.old_gome_code=v5.code_key LEFT JOIN (SELECT cw.azwd01 AS CODE,cw.wdmc AS NAME FROM crm_website cw UNION SELECT ho.org_code AS CODE ,ho.org_name AS NAME FROM hx_organization ho WHERE ho.org_type='02' OR org_type='03' UNION SELECT es.WERKS CODE,es.NAME1 NAME FROM ecc_store es WHERE es.VKORG LIKE 'S%') v6 ON v6.code=T.apply_unit
LEFT JOIN v_code v7 ON v7.code_id='gmdm' AND T.gome_code=v7.code_key
where 1=1 and FIND_IN_SET(create_organization,#{param.createOrganization}) and apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{param.applyId},'%') and category like CONCAT('%',#{param.category},'%') and apply_unit like CONCAT('%',#{param.applyUnit},'%') and sell_subsection like CONCAT('%',#{param.sellSubsection},'%') and sell_store like CONCAT('%',#{param.sellStore},'%') and is_presale like CONCAT('%',#{param.isPresale},'%') and is_onwall like CONCAT('%',#{param.isOnwall},'%') and customer_name like CONCAT('%',#{param.customerName},'%') and customer_phone like CONCAT('%',#{param.customerPhone},'%') and retreat_replacement like CONCAT('%',#{param.retreatReplacement},'%') and rr_mode like CONCAT('%',#{param.rrMode},'%') and fault_phenomenon like CONCAT('%',#{param.faultPhenomenon},'%') and fault_reason like CONCAT('%',#{param.faultReason},'%') and fault_reason_Detail like CONCAT('%',#{param.faultReasonDetail},'%') and delivery_order_num like CONCAT('%',#{param.deliveryOrderNum},'%') and old_machine_type like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldMachineType},'%') and old_gome_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldGomeCode},'%') and old_brand like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldBrand},'%') and old_machine_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldMachineCode},'%') and old_inner_code1 like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldInnerCode1},'%') and old_inner_code2 like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldInnerCode2},'%') and old_outer_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.oldOuterCode},'%') and machine_type like CONCAT('%',#{param.machineType},'%') and gome_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.gomeCode},'%') and brand like CONCAT('%',#{param.brand},'%') and machine_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.machineCode},'%') and inner_code1 like CONCAT('%',#{param.innerCode1},'%') and inner_code2 like CONCAT('%',#{param.innerCode2},'%') and outer_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.outerCode},'%') and status like CONCAT('%',#{param.status},'%') and check_result like CONCAT('%',#{param.checkResult},'%') and machine_check_fault_reason like CONCAT('%',#{param.machineCheckFaultReason},'%') and center_check_result like CONCAT('%',#{param.centerCheckResult},'%') and headquarters_check_result like CONCAT('%',#{param.headquartersCheckResult},'%') and buy_date >=#{param.buyDateStartTime} and buy_date <=#{param.buyDateEndTime} and apply_date >=#{param.applyDateStartTime} and apply_date <=#{param.applyDateEndTime} and install_date >=#{param.installDateStartTime} and install_date <=#{param.installDateEndTime} GROUP BY apply_id
